examUsers.uploadImageTooltip: Upload images for the registered students
examUsers.introText: This dialog can be used to upload pdf file and extract images for registered students.
examUsers.dialogText:
Each entry in the input file must contain a value for either matriculation number, login or email.
Values for last and first name are optional.
examUsers.pdfExampleText: Example of a valid PDF file format:

pdfFile.label: Select .pdf file
pdfFile.tooltip: Please select a .pdf file containing registered students image and matriculation number.

overview.imminentExplanation: You can already open the exam by clicking on the tile
overview.conductingExplanation: You can open the exam by clicking on the tile
overview.timeExtension: The normal working time is over
overview.timeExtensionExplanation: In case you have a time extension, the exam can be opened by clicking on the tile. Otherwise, you can review your submission.
overview.closedExplanation: You can review your submission by clicking on the tile
overview.reviewExplanation: You can review the assessment until
overview.noMoreAttemptsExplanation: There are currently no further attempts available

testExam.imminentExplanation: You can already open the test exam by clicking on the tile
testExam.conductingExplanation: You can start a new test exam by clicking on the tile
testExam.closedExplanation: Starting a new attempt is no longer possible
testExam.notSubmitted: You have not submitted your Test Exam on time!

examSummary.noSubmissionFound: You didn't submit any solution for this exercise.
examSummary.missingResultNotice: There is currently no result for this quiz exercise, although the results have already been published. Please inform your instructor.

points.youAchievedWithBonus: You achieved {{achievedPoints}} out of a maximum {{normalPoints}} possible points (including bonus points).
points.youAchieved: You achieved {{achievedPoints}} out of {{normalPoints}} possible points.

youAchievedFromBonus.GRADES_CONTINUOUS: You got a grade bonus of {{achievedBonus}} from {{bonusFromTitle}}.
youAchievedFromBonus.GRADES_DISCRETE: You got a grade bonus of {{achievedBonus}} step(s) according to the grading scale which equals {{gradePointDiff}} from {{bonusFromTitle}}.
youAchievedFromBonus.POINTS: You received {{achievedBonus}} additional bonus points from {{bonusFromTitle}}.

points.youAchievedPointsAfterBonus: Your final points are {{finalPoints}} after the bonus.
points.maxPointsNotSet: The maximum number of points in the exam is not set.

examSummary.bonus: Bonus points for the final exam

exam.title: Exam
exam.resultInformation: Your result will be published here as soon as the correction is finished. You can get to this page by clicking on this exam in the exam overview of this course.
exam.startConsentText: I hereby confirm with my full name, representing my signature, that I have read the conditions of participation and will adhere to them for the duration of the exam.
exam.endConsentText: I hereby confirm with my full name, representing my signature, that this exam is my own work and I have only used the indicated aids.
exam.notConfirmed: Please tick the checkbox to continue.
exam.falseName: Entered name is incorrect. Please try again!
exam.startExamToolTip: Button will be activated 5 minutes before the exam start.

cleanup.title: Cleanup
cleanup.question: Are you sure you want to clean up the exam {{ title }}? This will delete all student programming exercise repositories in the exam. This action can NOT be undone!

validation.startAndEndMustBeSet: The start and end date must be set for the exam
validation.atLeastOneExercisePerExerciseGroup: All exercise groups must have at least one exercise.
validation.allExercisesInExerciseGroupOfSameInclude: All exercises in an exercise group need to have the same meaning for the exam score calculation (normal exercise, bonus exercise, not included).
validation.allExercisesInExerciseGroupGiveSameNumbe: All exercises in an exercise group need to give the same number of points or bonus points
validation.tooManyMaxPoints: Check that you have correctly set the maximum points in the exam! The maximum points a student can earn in the mandatory exercise groups is too high
validation.tooFewMaxPoints: Check that you have correctly set the maximum points in the exam! The maximum points a student can earn in the exercise groups is too low
validation.numberOfExercisesMustBeSet: The number of exercises must be set for the exam.
validation.numberOfExercisesInExamNotSet: The number of exercises in the exam is not set.
validation.tooFewExerciseGroups: The number of exercise groups is too small.
validation.tooManyMandatoryExerciseGroups: The number of mandatory exercise groups is too large.
validation.maxPointsNotSet: The exam max points are not set.

error.cannotRegisterInstructor: You cannot register instructors or administrators for exams.

editWorkingTime.relative: Change relative to regular working time

examScores.highlightPassedMedian: Highlight median of passed exams in chart: {{ median }}%
examScores.highlightOverallMedian: Highlight median of all exams in chart: {{ median }}%
examScores.noGradingScaleExplanation: A student performance is considered to be critical if its corresponding score is below 40% and therefore in most cases would lead to failing the exam. A performance is considered to be uncritical otherwise.
examScores.gradingScaleExplanationNotBonus: A student performance is considered to be insufficient if it does not lead to passing the exam. A performance is considered to be sufficient otherwise.
examScores.gradingScaleExplanationBonus: A student performance is considered to be critical if its corresponding score achieves no bonus points. A performance is considered to be uncritical otherwise.
examScores.title: Exam Scores
examScores.averageExerciseTooltip: (Average / Maximum) points achieved for the exercise. The activated filters affect the average.
examScores.averageExerciseGroupTooltip: (Average / Maximum) points achieved for the exercise group. The activated filters affect the average.
examScores.participantsExerciseTooltip: (Filtered / Total) number of participants for the exercise. The activated filters only affect the first value.
examScores.participantsExerciseGroupTooltip: (Filtered / Total) number of participants for the exercise group. The activated filters only affect the first value.
examScores.filterForNonEmptySubmissions: Include only exercises with at least one non-empty submission
examScores.exerciseGroupTitle: Average scores of exercise group "{{ groupTitle }}" in comparison

examParticipation.connected: Your answers will be saved every 30s.
examParticipation.ideConnected: Your answers have to be submitted manually.
examParticipation.disconnected: You are disconnected. Please check your internet connection. You can continue working, but you need to be connected in order to save changes!
examParticipation.disconnectedCodeEditorAndOfflineIDE: You are disconnected. Please check your internet connection. You can still work offline by cloning the repository.
examParticipation.disconnectedCodeEditorNoOfflineIDE: You are disconnected. Please reconnect in order to continue working in the online code editor.
examParticipation.disconnectedNoCodeEditor: You are disconnected. Please check your internet connection.
examParticipation.waitForStart: Please wait until the exam "{{ title }}" begins.
examParticipation.noStudentExam: You are not registered for the exam. Please contact your instructor.
examParticipation.noFurtherAttempts: Currently no further attempts for the Test Exam are possible. To review your submission, navigate back to the Exam page
examParticipation.finish: This is the end of {{ title }}.
examParticipation.submitFinalExam: Please confirm and click on 'Finish' within the time limit.
examParticipation.preparingParticipation: Preparing exercise. This may take a few seconds.
examParticipation.generateParticipationFailed: The preparation of the exercise failed.
examParticipation.submitted: You have submitted a solution for this exercise. You can still work on it and submit again.
examParticipation.submittedSubmissionLimitReached: You have submitted a solution for this exercise. You cannot submit again as you have reached the submission limit.
examParticipation.saveSubmissionError: Your changes could not be saved! Please make sure that you are online and try saving again.
examParticipation.pendingChanges: All unsaved changes will be lost when leaving the exam! Are you sure that you want to continue?
examParticipation.continueAfterHandInEarlyDescription: You don't want to hand in yet?
examParticipation.handInEarlyNotice:
You are about to hand in your submission before the end of the exam.
After finishing the exam you cannot participate any longer.
examParticipation.handInEarlyNoticeFirstSentence: You are about to hand in your submission before the end of the exam.
examParticipation.handInEarlyNoticeSecondSentence: After finishing the exam you cannot participate any longer.
examParticipation.workingTimeIncreased: The end of working time was extended until {{ date }}.
examParticipation.workingTimeDecreased: The end of working time was shortened until {{ date }}.

submissionSuccessful.title: Your exam has been submitted successfully!
submissionSuccessful.noActionRequired: Artemis does not require any further action and this window can be closed.
submissionSuccessful.followExamProtocol: Be sure to follow your instructor's exam protocol.

exerciseGroup.deleted: Deleted exercise group with title {{ param }}

studentExams.title: Student exams
studentExams.unlockAllRepositoriesModalText:
All repositories will be immediately unlocked! Students will be able to clone & push even if the exam is not started yet!

This operation is automatically performed 5 minutes before the exam starts, therefore this operation should only be used manually if the automatic unlock failed!
studentExams.lockAllRepositoriesModalText:
All repositories will be immediately locked! Students will be no longer be able to push even if the exam is still running!
This will also affect students with extended working time!

This operation is automatically performed once the exam is over, therefore this operation should only be used manually if the automatic lock failed!
studentExams.searchForStudents: Search for students by login or name (comma separated)
studentExams.studentExamGenerationError:
There was an error during student exam generation:
 {{message}}
studentExams.missingStudentExamGenerationError:
There was an error during the missing student exam generation:
 {{message}}
studentExams.startExerciseSuccess: The exercises will now be prepared. This may take a while.
studentExams.startExerciseFailure:
There was an error during the preparation of the exercises:
 {{message}}
studentExams.studentExamGenerationModalText:
Some student exams already exist. If you continue, those individual exams will be deleted and new student exams generated.

Note that existing participations and submissions will also be removed!
studentExams.studentExamStatusSuccess: All registered students have an individual exam
studentExams.studentExamStatusWarning: Not all registered students have an individual exam
studentExams.studentExamStatusWarningTooltip: Click on the button 'Generate missing individual exams' to create the missing student exams. Alternatively, click the button 'Generate individual exams' to delete and re-create exams for all students
studentExams.studentExamStatusTestExam: Student exams are automatically created once a student requests to start a test exam
studentExams.evaluateQuizExerciseFailure:
There was an error during the evaluation of the quiz exercises:
 {{message}}
studentExams.assessUnsubmittedStudentExamsSuccess: Reviewed all student exams and assessed the unsubmitted or empty modeling and text exercises with 0 points.
studentExams.assessUnsubmittedStudentExamsFailure: The exam is not over yet for all students
studentExams.unlockAllRepositoriesSuccess: Repositories of {{number}} programming exercises were unlocked.
studentExams.unlockAllRepositoriesFailure:
There was an error during the unlocking of the programming exercises:
 {{message}}
studentExams.lockAllRepositoriesSuccess: Repositories of {{number}} programming exercises were locked.
studentExams.lockAllRepositoriesFailure:
There was an error during the locking of the programming exercises:
 {{message}}
studentExams.setWorkingTimeRelative: Addition relative to regular working time:

removeAllStudents.title: Remove all students
removeAllStudents.question: Are you sure you want to remove all students from the exam?
removeAllStudents.confirmationText: Please enter the name of the exam to confirm removing all students from the exam!

confirmDialog.question: Are you sure you want to change the submission state?
confirmDialog.submitText: This will set the submission date of the exam to this moment, and the submission state to 'submitted'. You will be allowed to un-submit the exam later.
confirmDialog.unSubmitText: This will delete the submission date and set the submission state to 'unsubmitted'.
confirmDialog.warningRemove: Recovering the original submission date will not be possible after deletion!

examManagement.reviewDatesInvalidWarning: End of Student Review is set incorrect or missing
examManagement.reviewDatesInvalidExplanation: If the Begin of Student Review is set, the End of Student Review has to be set as well. Furthermore, the End of Student Review has to be chronologically after its Begin.

sections.assessmentEmptyDates: If you leave a date blank, this exam step will not take place

examManagement.title: Exam Management
examManagement.visibleDateTooltip: Students can see the exam and open the start page from this time onwards, but cannot access the exercises
examManagement.startDateTooltip: Students can participate in the exam from this time onwards
examManagement.endDateTooltip: Students can participate in the exam until this time
examManagement.workingTimeTooltip: The working time is computed based on the start and end time
examManagement.gracePeriodTooltip: The time given to students to hand in their exam after the working time. No new submissions are possible during the grace period
examManagement.exampleSolutionPublicationDateTooltip: Students can see the example solutions for all exercises in the exam from this time onwards if they participated in the exam. Leave blank to disable.

maxPoints.title: Maximum number of points for exam
maxPoints.warning: Updating this field will update the grading scale for the exam if such exists, such that the points values for the grade steps still match the percentages, adjusted for the new maximum points value. This also affects all students' grades in the exam!

examManagement.numberOfCorrectionRoundsInExam: Number of correction rounds in exam

testExam.examModeTooltip: Students can start working on a Test Exam once within the working window, the selected working time will be available during the conduction. Students recieve automated feedback after submitting. NOTE: This cannot be changed later on!
testExam.workingTimeTooltip: The working time allowed to the students per run

testRun.title: Test Run Management:
testRun.author: Author
testRun.setWorkingTime: Set a working time (minutes and seconds):
testRun.setupHint: Select an exercise for every exercise group by clicking on it. Note: If you have already created a test run with one of the exercises, the exercise will already contain a submission and result.
testRun.text: Here you can create a test run for the exam. Pick which exercises your exam should contain and begin. Afterwards you will be able to assess your submissions and grade them as a tutor. You have the option to view the results and complain as a student. Additionally, you can also respond to the complaints about the assessment as a tutor. Note: Submissions made within test runs do not count towards the exam scores.
testRun.reminderToDelete: Make sure to delete all Test Runs before conducting the exam. All test runs are automatically deleted if you assess the unsubmitted student exams and empty submissions.
testRun.secondCorrectionHint: Hint: The second correction does not apply to test runs.
testRun.assessTestRunDisabled: None of your test runs have ended

delete.question: Should the {{ title }} really be deleted? All associated elements will also be deleted, if they are not referenced by any other test run.
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type: Test Run to confirm.

examStudents.allStudentsCheckedPassed: All the students have been checked successfully
examStudents.searchForUsers: Register a student for this exam by searching for login or name
examStudents.searchStudents: Search students by name or login
examStudents.name: Name
examStudents.registerAllFromCourseTooltip: Register all students enrolled in this course
examStudents.verifyAttendanceTooltip: Verify the attendance check of the students
examStudents.examNotStarted: The exam has not started yet

removeFromExam.modalQuestion: Are you sure you want to unregister the student with login {{ title }} from this exam?
removeFromExam.deleteParticipationsAndSubmission: Additionally delete this student's participation and submissions in the associated exam? This action can NOT be undone!
removeFromExam.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the login of the student to confirm.

exerciseGroup.selectExerciseGroupExplanation: Select the individual exercises, which should be imported alongside the exercise groups, by clicking on it
exerciseGroup.noExerciseGroup: The selected exam {{examTitle}} has no exercise groups
exerciseGroup.title: Title
exerciseGroup.noExercises: No exercises have been added yet.
exerciseGroup.titleInfo: The title of the exercise group is shown to the students as the name of the exercise.

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete the exercise group {{ title }}? All associated exercises will also be deleted.
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the exercise group to confirm.

exerciseGroup.orderCouldNotBeSaved: The order could not be saved

importModal.title: Import Exam Exercises
importModal.explanation: Select the individual exercises, which should be imported alongside the exam, by clicking on it
importModal.exerciseGroupTooltip: The title of an exercise group can be changed before the import
importModal.exerciseTitleTooltip: The title of an exercise can be changed before the import. Further changes are possible after the import
importModal.shortNameTooltip: The shortname of a programming task must be unique. The short name of the exercise can NOT be edited after creating the exercise! The short name must begin with a letter, must not contain any special characters and must be at least 3 characters long
importModal.invalidKey: The chosen short name and title of {{ number }} programming exercise(s) already exists. Please insert a new short name and title for the corresponding programming exercise(s)
importModal.duplicatedProgrammingExerciseShortName: Multiple programming exercises in the exam have the same short name. Please choose a different short name!
importModal.duplicatedProgrammingExerciseTitle: Multiple programming exercises in the exam have the same title. Please choose a different title!
importModal.invalidExerciseConfiguration: One or more of the values specified are invalid. Please change them before importing
importModal.isImporting: The import of the exercise groups and the exercises is currently done on the server. This may take some time
importModal.infoProgrammingExercises: Programming exercises are imported using their initial configuration. This import functionality cannot be used for changing the submission policy, for activating / deactivating the static code analysis or for creating new build plans. In this case, please import the exercises individually into the exercise groups.

delete.question: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the Exam {{ title }}? All associated elements will be deleted including the Student Exams. This action can NOT be undone!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the exam to confirm.

reset.question: Are you sure you want to permanently reset the Exam {{ title }}? All Student Exams will be deleted. Registered students and the exercise configurations will remain. This action can NOT be undone!
reset.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the exam to confirm.
reset.success: The exam has been successfully reset.

checklist.title: Exam Checklist
checklist.conductionPlannedFromTo: The conduction is planned from {{ from }} to {{ to }}
checklist.introduction: This page gives an overview over the various steps when conducting an exam. In the
checklist.introductionPart2: you can find more details about the individual steps.

testExam.title: Test Exam Checklist
testExam.introduction: This page gives an overview over the various steps when creating a test exam.
testExam.detailsHintForTestExams: For test exams, the following applies
testExam.studentRegistration: Students are automatically registered for the test exam when starting a test exam
testExam.instantResults: The results are automatically published once a student submits the exam

tableItem.exerciseGroups: Create at least one exercise group with exercises

descriptionItem.register: You can register students for the exam in three different ways: via a .csv file, manually, or by importing all students registered in the course.
descriptionItem.exerciseGroups: You can create exercise groups with multiple exercise variants to make cheating for students more difficult. The points in all exercises within a given exercise group must be identical, and the number of exercise groups must equal the exam's number of exercises.
descriptionItem.generateStudentExams:
You need to generate exams for all registered students before starting the exam. Their working time can be adjusted individually.
Additionally, the commits of the templates in programming exercises will be combined into one commit.
descriptionItem.prepareExerciseStart: You need to prepare the exercises before the exam starts.
descriptionItem.examDetails: Before conducting an exam, please make sure to have filled out all exam details. (Start text, dates, etc.)
descriptionItem.conductExam: On the student exam page you can see which students have already submitted their exam.
descriptionItem.assessAllSubmissions: The number of correction rounds per exercise depends on the exam's number of correction rounds.
descriptionItem.publishResults: Publishing the results makes them available to students. Student exams are published on the publishing date for results within the exam.
descriptionItem.examReview: Make sure to have all dates specified correctly.
descriptionItem.resolveComplaints: Complaints can be resolved from the Assessment Dashboard.
descriptionItem.testRun: Try out different combinations of exercise variants from the student perspective.
descriptionItem.exportResults: Exports the exam results as a .csv file.
descriptionItem.editWorkingTime: Until five minutes before the end of the exam, you can extend its duration.
descriptionItem.suspiciousBehavior: Check for suspicious behaviour and plagiarism in the suspicious behavior dashboard.

textitems.numberofexercisegroupsequal: Number of exercises in the exam equals the number of exercise groups
textitems.numberofexercisegroupsinbetween: Number of exercises in the exam is between the number of mandatory exercise groups and the total number of exercise groups
textitems.eachexercisegroup: Each exercise group contains at least one exercise
textitems.pointsexercisegroupequal: Points in exercises of each exercise group are identical
textitems.totalpointspossible: Maximum number of points in exam can be attained with the current exercise group configuration
textitems.allexamsgenerated: All exams generated for registered students
textitems.startdatereviewset: Start date of exam review set
textitems.enddatereviewset: End date of exam review set
textitems.allExercisesPrepared: All exercises prepared for all students
textitems.noSubmissions: There are currently no submitted exams.

editWorkingTime.title: Edit Exam Duration
editWorkingTime.label: Exam duration change
editWorkingTime.duration: The new duration of the exam will be {{ duration }}.
editWorkingTime.question: This will change the working time for all students. Do you really want to edit the duration of the exam {{ title }}?
editWorkingTime.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the exam to confirm.

suspiciousBehavior.title: Suspicious Behavior
suspiciousBehavior.examSessionDescription: Whenever a student enters a exam, a session is created for the student. This session is the combination of IP address, session token, user agent, browser fingerprint, browser instance ID and a timestamp.
suspiciousBehavior.suspiciousSessionDescription: A session will be flagged as suspicious if it fulfills one of the following criteria:
suspiciousBehavior.suspiciousSessionCriterionIpAddress: Multiple sessions with the same IP address belong to different students' exams
suspiciousBehavior.suspiciousSessionCriterionBrowserFingerp: Multiple sessions with the same browser fingerprint belong to different students' exams

studentExamDetail.name: Name:
studentExamDetail.title: Title
studentExamDetail.workingTimeCouldNotBeSaved: The working time could not be saved.
studentExamDetail.saveWorkingTimeSuccessful: The working time was saved successfully.
studentExamDetail.toggleSuccessful: The submitted status was changed successfully.
studentExamDetail.togglefailed: The submitted status could not be changed!

studentExam.submissionNotInTime: You have not submitted your exam on time. It will not be graded!
studentExam.handInFailed: Submission of your exam failed. Please try again!

testExam.maxPointsWrong: Exam Points should be set to {{ points }}

testExam.conductionSuspended: Students cannot start a Test Exam!
